name: Tunnel Hill Pharmacy
about:
Tunnel Hill Pharmacy first opened in 1969 and is still an independent, community centered, retail pharmacy today. Tunnel Hill Pharmacy focuses on offering high quality, cost effective prescriptions made in the USA and superior customer service.  We are located in the Shop Rite plaza at the intersection of Hwy 2 and Chattanooga Rd, next to Tunnel Hill Walk-In Medical Center.    

Cutomer Quote: One long-time customer is quoted as saying that, 'We feel comfortable coming to the pharmacy because we're used to it'. Our customers are important to us and we offer pure, uncontaminated medicine at competitive prices, efficient, friendly service, and a welcoming environment. 

Generations:  Several families have been such long-time, dedicated customers that Tunnel Hill Pharmacy  is still serving them after three generations!

privacyPolicy:
This Pharmacy is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology that gives you the most powerful and safe mobile experience. This Statement of Privacy applies to the this Pharmacy's mobile applications and governs data collection and usage. By using the this Pharmacy's mobile application, you consent to the data practices described in this statement. 

Collection of your Personal Information
This Pharmacy collects personally identifiable information, such as your e-mail address, name, home or work address or telephone number. This Pharmacy also collects anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as your ZIP code, age, gender, preferences, interests and favorites.

There is also information about your mobile device hardware and software that is automatically collected by This Pharmacy. This information is used by this Pharmacy for the operation of the service, to maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the This Pharmacy mobile application.

Please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information or personally sensitive data through This Pharmacy public message boards, this information may be collected and used by others. Note: This Pharmacy does not read any of your private online communications.

This Pharmacy encourages you to review the privacy statements of mobile applications you choose to link to from this Pharmacy so that you can understand how those mobile applications collect, use and share your information. This Pharmacy is not responsible for the privacy statements or other content on mobile applications outside of the This Pharmacy and This Pharmacy family of mobile applications.

Use of your Personal Information
This Pharmacy collects and uses your personal information to operate the This Pharmacy mobile application and deliver the services you have requested. This Pharmacy also uses your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services available from This Pharmacy and its affiliates. This Pharmacy may also contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services or of potential new services that may be offered.

This Pharmacy does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties. This Pharmacy may, from time to time, contact you on behalf of external business partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you. In those cases, your unique personally identifiable information (e-mail, name, address, telephone number) is not transferred to the third party. In addition, This Pharmacy may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis, send you email or postal mail, provide customer support, or arrange for deliveries. All such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to provide these services to This Pharmacy, and they are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.

This Pharmacy does not use or disclose sensitive personal information, such as race, religion, or political affiliations, without your explicit consent.

This Pharmacy keeps track of the mobile applications and pages our customers visit within This Pharmacy, in order to determine what This Pharmacy services are the most popular. This data is used to deliver customized content and advertising within This Pharmacy to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested in a particular subject area.

This Pharmacy mobile applications will disclose your personal information, without notice, only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served on This Pharmacy or the site; (b) protect and defend the rights or property of This Pharmacy; and, (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of this Pharmacy, or the public.

Security of your Personal Information
This Pharmacy secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. This Pharmacy secures the personally identifiable information you provide on computer servers in a controlled, secure environment, protected from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. When personal information (such as a credit card number) is transmitted to other mobile applications, it is protected through the use of encryption.

Changes to this Statement
This Pharmacy will occasionally update this Statement of Privacy to reflect company and customer feedback. This Pharmacy encourages you to periodically review this Statement to be informed of how This Pharmacy is protecting your information.

Contact Information
This Pharmacy welcomes your comments regarding this Statement of Privacy. If you believe that This Pharmacy has not adhered to this Statement, please contact this Pharmacy. We will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly determine and remedy the problem.
